title: Jeff And Sheri Easter Discography 1992-2012 (18 Releases)
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------
JEFF AND SHERI EASTER DISCOGRAPHY
--------------------------------------------------------------

This discography may or may not be complete.  It contains the following 18 releases...

 * 1992 - Pickin The Best, Live
 * 1994 - Brand New Love
 * 1994 - Thread Of Hope
 * 1995 - By Request
 * 1995 - Silent Witness
 * 1996 - Places In Time
 * 1997 - Ever Faithful To You
 * 1998 - A Work In Progress
 * 1999 - Sittin' On Cloud Nine
 * 2000 - Through The Years
 * 2002 - My, Oh My!
 * 2003 - Forever And A Day
 * 2004 - Sunshine
 * 2006 - Ordinary Day
 * 2008 - We Are Family
 * 2010 - Expecting Good Things
 * 2011 - Silver Anniversary
 * 2012 - Eyes Wide Open

Jeff Easter and Sheri Williamson met in August 1984 during the Albert E. Brumley Sundown to Sunup Gospel Sing in Arkansas. At the time, Jeff was the bassist for the Singing Americans, while Sheri was performing with The Lewis Family. After being introduced, they married ten months later.  After that, Jeff and Sheri traveled and performed as part of The Lewis Family, until they decided to pursue a career alone in 1988. Since that, they've released several albums and have been nominated to various awards.AD was a 1980s Christian rock band, featuring former Kansas members Kerry Livgren and Dave Hope, and former Bloodrock member Warren Ham sharing the lead vocal duties along with Michael Gleason.

For Him,
TorrentTracts - October 2013
